column1: Table 5. Substance dependence or abuse among prison and jail inmates, by mental health status
report title: Mental Health Problems of Prison and Jail Inmates  NCJ 213600
data source: Survey of Inmates in State and Federal Correctional Facilities, 2004; Survey of Inmates in Local Jails, 2002
authors: Doris J. James and Lauren E. Glaze
Table 5. Substance dependence or abuse among prison and jail inmates, by mental health status
Note: Substance dependence or abuse was measured based on criteria specified in the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, fourth edition (DSM-IV).
For details, see Substance Dependence, Abuse, and Treatment of Jail Inmates, 2002, <http://www.ojp.usdoj.gov/bjs/abstract/sdatji02.htm>.
